name: punchball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a ball filled with air, hung from a frame or attached to a stand and used for training or exercise: She works out every day with a punchball. Compare
punchbag
David Tran/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a punchball installed in his garage.He damaged his wrist hitting a punchball.They practised with dumbbells and a punchball.
